title: Doraemon: Nobita to Mirai Note
synopsis: Educational video produced by the New Energy and Industrial Technology Development Organization (NEDO) in 1994, it was later included on the 13th issue of Boku, Doraemon magazine released on August 20, 2004.
staff: [["Koorogi '73", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Fujiko, Fujio F.', ['Original Creator']], ['Kikuchi, Shunsuke', ['Music']]]
